arts.ttl: Nick Woltemade inspires stunning VfB Stuttgart comeback against Union Berlin
arts.sum: Nick Woltemade scored twice as VfB Stuttgart staged a remarkable comeback to overturn a two-goal deficit and beat Union Berlin 3-2 in the Matchday 13 opener. Stuttgart goalkeeper Alexander Nübel was unable to keep the header out, giving Union a 1-0 lead at half-time.

arts.ttl: Woltemade plays "Super Sup" as Stuttgart come back against Union
arts.sum: Two sensational goals from second half sub Nick Woltemade helped VfB Stuttgart overcome a 0-2 deficit against 1. FC Union Berlin at the MHP Arena on Friday night.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart vs. Union Berlin preview: Can the visitors end their winless run?
arts.sum: Union Berlin will look to end a six-game winless run in all competitions when they travel to the MHPArena for Friday’s clash with Stuttgart.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart updates: Millot declared fit for Union, Leweling still out
arts.sum: Stuttgart coach Sebastian Hoeness confirmed on Thursday that Enzo Millot is fit to face Union Berlin after shaking off a knock. Jamie Leweling, however, remains unavailable.

arts.ttl: Preview: Stuttgart vs. Union Berlin - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Bundesliga clash between Stuttgart and Union Berlin, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
